channel.title: Windows Insider Preview on Christian Amado's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Windows Insider Preview on Christian Amado's Blog

item.title: Enable Windows Subsystem for Android™️
item.author: biz@cmas.dev (Christian Amado)
item.description:
In this article I will show step by step how to enable the Windows Subsystem for Android in our favorite operating system. Please note that at the time of writing this article it is not available outside of the US.

Windows 11 Insider Preview Build 22593

item.title: Windows 11: Create shortcut to virtual machine
item.author: biz@cmas.dev (Christian Amado)
item.description:
The most practical and useful thing for a user is to find what they are looking for quickly and easily. That is why I will show the steps to create a shortcut to a virtual machine in Hyper-V.

Windows 11 Insider Preview Build 22593
